verses.kjv: And it came to pass in the four hundred and eightieth year after the children of Israel were come out of the land of Egypt, in the fourth year of Solomon’s reign over Israel, in the month Zif, which is the second month, that he began to build the house of the LORD.
verses.web: In the four hundred and eightieth year after the children of Israel had come out of the land of Egypt, in the fourth year of Solomon’s reign over Israel, in the month Ziv, which is the second month, he began to build LORD’s house.
verses.ct: 480 years after the people of Israel came out of Egypt, in the 4th year of Solomon's reign over Israel, during the month of Zif — the 2nd month — he began building the house of the LORD.

verses.kjv: And the house which king Solomon built for the LORD, the length thereof was threescore cubits, and the breadth thereof twenty cubits, and the height thereof thirty cubits.
verses.web: The house which king Solomon built for LORD had a length of sixty cubits, and its width twenty, and its height thirty cubits.
verses.ct: The house that King Solomon built for the LORD was 60 cubits long, 20 cubits wide, and 30 cubits tall.

verses.kjv: And the porch before the temple of the house, twenty cubits was the length thereof, according to the breadth of the house; and ten cubits was the breadth thereof before the house.
verses.web: The porch in front of the temple of the house had a length of twenty cubits, which was along the width of the house. Ten cubits was its width in front of the house.
verses.ct: The entrance porch in front of the main hall was 20 cubits wide, matching the width of the house, and it extended 10 cubits out from the front.

verses.kjv: And for the house he made windows of narrow lights.
verses.web: He made windows of fixed lattice work for the house.
verses.ct: He installed windows with narrow frames throughout the house.

verses.kjv: And against the wall of the house he built chambers round about, against the walls of the house round about, both of the temple and of the oracle: and he made chambers round about:
verses.web: Against the wall of the house, he built floors all around, against the walls of the house all around, both of the temple and of the inner sanctuary; and he made side rooms all around.
verses.ct: Along the outside walls of the house — around both the main hall and the inner sanctuary — he built a structure of side rooms on every side.

verses.kjv: The nethermost chamber was five cubits broad, and the middle was six cubits broad, and the third was seven cubits broad: for without in the wall of the house he made narrowed rests round about, that the beams should not be fastened in the walls of the house.
verses.web: The lowest floor was five cubits wide, and the middle was six cubits wide, and the third was seven cubits wide; for on the outside he made offsets in the wall of the house all around, that the beams should not be inserted into the walls of the house.
verses.ct: The lowest level of rooms was 5 cubits wide, the middle level was 6 cubits wide, and the top level was 7 cubits wide. He built ledges into the outer wall of the house at each level so that the support beams wouldn't have to be inserted into the temple walls themselves.

verses.kjv: And the house, when it was in building, was built of stone made ready before it was brought thither: so that there was neither hammer nor axe nor any tool of iron heard in the house, while it was in building.
verses.web: The house, when it was under construction, was built of stone prepared at the quarry; and no hammer or ax or any tool of iron was heard in the house while it was under construction.
verses.ct: Every stone used in building the house was shaped and finished at the quarry before it arrived. Because of this, no hammer, axe, or any iron tool was heard at the construction site while the house was being built.

verses.kjv: The door for the middle chamber was in the right side of the house: and they went up with winding stairs into the middle chamber, and out of the middle into the third.
verses.web: The door for the middle side rooms was in the right side of the house. They went up by winding stairs into the middle floor, and out of the middle into the third.
verses.ct: The entrance to the lowest level of side rooms was on the south side of the house. A spiral staircase led up to the middle level, and from there to the top level.

verses.kjv: So he built the house, and finished it; and covered the house with beams and boards of cedar.
verses.web: So he built the house, and finished it; and he covered the house with beams and planks of cedar.
verses.ct: Solomon finished building the house and roofed it with cedar beams and planks.

verses.kjv: And then he built chambers against all the house, five cubits high: and they rested on the house with timber of cedar.
verses.web: He built the floors all along the house, each five cubits high; and they rested on the house with timber of cedar.
verses.ct: He also completed the side rooms that ran along the entire house, each standing 5 cubits high and attached to the house with cedar timbers.

verses.kjv: And the word of the LORD came to Solomon, saying,
verses.web: LORD’s word came to Solomon, saying,
verses.ct: Then the word of the LORD came to Solomon:

verses.kjv: Concerning this house which thou art in building, if thou wilt walk in my statutes, and execute my judgments, and keep all my commandments to walk in them; then will I perform my word with thee, which I spake unto David thy father:
verses.web: “Concerning this house which you are building, if you will walk in my statutes, and execute my ordinances, and keep all my commandments to walk in them; then I will establish my word with you, which I spoke to David your father.
verses.ct: "About this house you are building — if you follow my statutes, carry out my judgments, and obey all my commandments by living according to them, then I will keep the promise I made to your father David.

verses.kjv: And I will dwell among the children of Israel, and will not forsake my people Israel.
verses.web: I will dwell among the children of Israel, and will not forsake my people Israel.”
verses.ct: I will live among the people of Israel, and I will never abandon my people Israel."

verses.kjv: So Solomon built the house, and finished it.
verses.web: So Solomon built the house, and finished it.
verses.ct: So Solomon built the house and completed it.

verses.kjv: And he built the walls of the house within with boards of cedar, both the floor of the house, and the walls of the ceiling: and he covered them on the inside with wood, and covered the floor of the house with planks of fir.
verses.web: He built the walls of the house within with boards of cedar: from the floor of the house to the walls of the ceiling, he covered them on the inside with wood; and he covered the floor of the house with cypress boards.
verses.ct: He lined the interior walls with cedar boards from floor to ceiling, covering every surface with wood. He also laid the floor with cypress planks.

verses.kjv: And he built twenty cubits on the sides of the house, both the floor and the walls with boards of cedar: he even built them for it within, even for the oracle, even for the most holy place.
verses.web: He built twenty cubits on the back part of the house with boards of cedar from the floor to the ceiling. He built them for it within, for an inner sanctuary, even for the most holy place.
verses.ct: At the back of the house, he partitioned off a room 20 cubits deep, paneling it from floor to ceiling with cedar boards. This became the inner sanctuary — the most holy place.

verses.kjv: And the house, that is, the temple before it, was forty cubits long.
verses.web: In front of the temple sanctuary was forty cubits.
verses.ct: The main hall in front of the inner sanctuary was 40 cubits long.

verses.kjv: And the cedar of the house within was carved with knops and open flowers: all was cedar; there was no stone seen.
verses.web: There was cedar on the house within, carved with buds and open flowers. All was cedar. No stone was visible.
verses.ct: The cedar paneling inside the house was carved with gourds and open flowers. Everything was covered in cedar — not a single stone was visible.

verses.kjv: And the oracle he prepared in the house within, to set there the ark of the covenant of the LORD.
verses.web: He prepared an inner sanctuary in the middle of the house within, to set the ark of LORD’s covenant there.
verses.ct: He prepared the inner sanctuary deep within the house as the place where the ark of the covenant of the LORD would rest.

verses.kjv: And the oracle in the forepart was twenty cubits in length, and twenty cubits in breadth, and twenty cubits in the height thereof: and he overlaid it with pure gold; and so covered the altar which was of cedar.
verses.web: Within the inner sanctuary was twenty cubits in length, and twenty cubits in width, and twenty cubits in its height; and he overlaid it with pure gold; and he covered the altar with cedar.
verses.ct: The inner sanctuary was a perfect cube — 20 cubits long, 20 cubits wide, and 20 cubits high. He overlaid it entirely with pure gold, and he also covered the cedar altar with gold.

verses.kjv: So Solomon overlaid the house within with pure gold: and he made a partition by the chains of gold before the oracle; and he overlaid it with gold.
verses.web: So Solomon overlaid the house within with pure gold. He drew chains of gold across before the inner sanctuary, and he overlaid it with gold.
verses.ct: Solomon overlaid the entire interior of the house with pure gold. He stretched gold chains across the front of the inner sanctuary and covered that area with gold as well.

verses.kjv: And the whole house he overlaid with gold, until he had finished all the house: also the whole altar that was by the oracle he overlaid with gold.
verses.web: He overlaid the whole house with gold, until all the house was finished. He also overlaid the whole altar that belonged to the inner sanctuary with gold.
verses.ct: He covered every part of the house with gold until the whole structure was finished. He also overlaid the entire altar that stood before the inner sanctuary with gold.

verses.kjv: And within the oracle he made two cherubims of olive tree, each ten cubits high.
verses.web: In the inner sanctuary he made two cherubim of olive wood, each ten cubits high.
verses.ct: Inside the inner sanctuary, he made 2 cherubim out of olive wood, each standing 10 cubits tall.

verses.kjv: And five cubits was the one wing of the cherub, and five cubits the other wing of the cherub: from the uttermost part of the one wing unto the uttermost part of the other were ten cubits.
verses.web: Five cubits was the one wing of the cherub, and five cubits the other wing of the cherub. From the tip of one wing to the tip of the other was ten cubits.
verses.ct: Each wing of the first cherub measured 5 cubits, so from wingtip to wingtip it spanned 10 cubits.

verses.kjv: And the other cherub was ten cubits: both the cherubims were of one measure and one size.
verses.web: The other cherub was ten cubits. Both the cherubim were of one measure and one form.
verses.ct: The second cherub also measured 10 cubits across. Both cherubim were identical in size and shape.

verses.kjv: The height of the one cherub was ten cubits, and so was it of the other cherub.
verses.web: One cherub was ten cubits high, and so was the other cherub.
verses.ct: Each cherub stood 10 cubits tall.

verses.kjv: And he set the cherubims within the inner house: and they stretched forth the wings of the cherubims, so that the wing of the one touched the one wall, and the wing of the other cherub touched the other wall; and their wings touched one another in the midst of the house.
verses.web: He set the cherubim within the inner house. The wings of the cherubim were stretched out, so that the wing of the one touched the one wall, and the wing of the other cherub touched the other wall; and their wings touched one another in the middle of the house.
verses.ct: He placed the cherubim inside the inner sanctuary with their wings spread wide. One wing of the first cherub touched one wall, and one wing of the second cherub touched the opposite wall, while their other wings met each other in the center of the room.

verses.kjv: And he overlaid the cherubims with gold.
verses.web: He overlaid the cherubim with gold.
verses.ct: He overlaid both cherubim with gold.

verses.kjv: And he carved all the walls of the house round about with carved figures of cherubims and palm trees and open flowers, within and without.
verses.web: He carved all the walls of the house around with carved figures of cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers, inside and outside.
verses.ct: On every wall throughout the house — both in the inner and outer rooms — he carved designs of cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers.

verses.kjv: And the floor of the house he overlaid with gold, within and without.
verses.web: He overlaid the floor of the house with gold, inside and outside.
verses.ct: He overlaid the floors with gold in both the inner and outer rooms.

verses.kjv: And for the entering of the oracle he made doors of olive tree: the lintel and side posts were a fifth part of the wall.
verses.web: For the entrance of the inner sanctuary, he made doors of olive wood. The lintel and door posts were a fifth part of the wall.
verses.ct: For the entrance to the inner sanctuary, he made doors of olive wood. The lintel and doorposts took up a 5th of the wall.

verses.kjv: The two doors also were of olive tree; and he carved upon them carvings of cherubims and palm trees and open flowers, and overlaid them with gold, and spread gold upon the cherubims, and upon the palm trees.
verses.web: So he made two doors of olive wood; and he carved on them carvings of cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers, and overlaid them with gold. He spread the gold on the cherubim and on the palm trees.
verses.ct: The 2 olive wood doors were carved with cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers, then overlaid with gold. He pressed gold over the carved cherubim and palm trees.

verses.kjv: So also made he for the door of the temple posts of olive tree, a fourth part of the wall.
verses.web: He also did so for the entrance of the temple door posts of olive wood, out of a fourth part of the wall;
verses.ct: For the entrance to the main hall, he made doorposts of olive wood that took up a 4th of the wall.

verses.kjv: And the two doors were of fir tree: the two leaves of the one door were folding, and the two leaves of the other door were folding.
verses.web: and two doors of cypress wood. The two leaves of the one door were folding, and the two leaves of the other door were folding.
verses.ct: The 2 doors themselves were made of cypress wood, each with 2 folding panels that could swing open.

verses.kjv: And he carved thereon cherubims and palm trees and open flowers: and covered them with gold fitted upon the carved work.
verses.web: He carved cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers; and he overlaid them with gold fitted on the engraved work.
verses.ct: He carved cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers into them, then covered the carvings evenly with gold.

verses.kjv: And he built the inner court with three rows of hewed stone, and a row of cedar beams.
verses.web: He built the inner court with three courses of cut stone and a course of cedar beams.
verses.ct: He built the inner courtyard with 3 rows of cut stone topped by a row of cedar beams.

verses.kjv: In the fourth year was the foundation of the house of the LORD laid, in the month Zif:
verses.web: The foundation of LORD’s house was laid in the fourth year, in the month Ziv.
verses.ct: The foundation of the LORD's house was laid in the 4th year of Solomon's reign, during the month of Zif.

verses.kjv: And in the eleventh year, in the month Bul, which is the eighth month, was the house finished throughout all the parts thereof, and according to all the fashion of it. So was he seven years in building it.
verses.web: In the eleventh year, in the month Bul, which is the eighth month, the house was finished throughout all its parts, and according to all its specifications. So he spent seven years building it.
verses.ct: In the 11th year, during the month of Bul — the 8th month — the house was completed in every detail, exactly as planned. It took Solomon 7 years to build it.
